Address.label: Address
Address.value: 15985 EAST HIGH STREET, MIDDLEFIELD, Ohio, 44062-0035, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Middlefield Banc Corp is a United States-based bank holding company. It offers customers banking services, including checking, savings, negotiable order of withdrawal accounts, money market accounts, time certificates of deposit, commercial loans, and other services. It also maintains, manages, and disposes of nonperforming loans and other real estate owned.
